comments.body: @krmayankk this file is generated, but I get your meaning. However, you should add review to the comments in types.go so they are actionable.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +248,252 @@	"":          "StatefulSetUpdateStrategy indicates the strategy that the StatefulSet controller will use to perform updates. It includes any additional parameters necessary to perform the update for the indicated strategy.",
	"type":      "Type indicates the type of the StatefulSetUpdateStrategy.",
	"partition": "Partition is used to communicate the ordinal at which to partition the StatefulSet when Type is PartitionStatefulSetStrategyType. This value must be set when Type is PartitionStatefulSetStrategyType, and it must be nil otherwise.",
}
